branchCategory.name: AW - Special Environment
branchCategory.description: <p>This combination Filter/ Regulator minimizes space and piping by integrating the 2 units into one. Standard features include a relieving regulator, which can be quickly locked by pushing down on the adjustment knob. There are many options, which include gauges, auto-drain, metal bowl and covers, different set pressures, etc. The AW is part of the family of modular air preparation units and can be combined with other similar sized products. This series is available in four body sizes with piping from M5 to 3/4 in Rc, NPT or G thread types.</p>

branchItem.name: AW20-40, Modular Style Filter/Regulator, Epoxy Coated
branchItem.description: <p>This combination Filter/ Regulator minimizes space and piping by integrating the 2 units into one. Standard features include a relieving regulator, which can be quickly locked by pushing down on the adjustment knob. There are many options, which include gauges, auto-drain, metal bowl and covers, different set pressures, etc. The AW is part of the family of modular air preparation units and can be combined with other similar sized products. This series is available in four body sizes with piping from M5 to 3/4 in Rc, NPT or G thread types.</p>

branchItem.name: AW*-X2622, Filter Regulator, Stainless Steel 316 and Special Temperature Environment (-40°C)
branchItem.description: <p>AW-X2622 is a 316 stainless steel filter regulator with an enhanced temperature range.  This model is capable of operation in ambient temperatures of -40 to -176<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">°F (-40 to 80</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">°C) and line pressures up to 290 psi (2.0 MPa).</span></p>

branchItem.name: AW*-X2709, Filter Regulator for Outdoor Environment
branchItem.description: <p>AW-X2709 is a filter regulator with al metal external construction for enhanced durability in outdoor environments.  All exposed metal parts are stainless steel.  A special waterproof cover permits direct venting while preventing the entry of rainwater.</p>
